summary: When the Russian Premier is taken hostage at a rock concert in Moscow, it's up to a drummer, an ex-biker, to save him.
cast: Dolph Lundgren|Melissa Molinaro|Hristo Shopov|Dave Legeno|Clement von Franckenstein|James Chalke|Zachary Baharov|Ivaylo Geraskov|Shelly Varod|Katarzyna Wolejnio|Ida Lundgren|Robin Dobson|Raicho Vasilev|Slavi Slavov|Naum Shopov|Atanas Srebrev|Vladimir Kolev|Harry Anichkin|Nikolai Iliev|Anna Kulinova|Darin Angelov|Dejan Kamenov|Rene Shindarov|Nadejda Ivanova|Nikolay Stanoev|Julian Vergov|Krasimir Todorov|Yavor Alexandrov|Alexander Obretenov|Desislav Semerdjiev|Dimitar Karnev|Velislav Pavlov|Rosen Kovachev|Dimo Dimov|Tihomir Tenev|Lazar Nikolov|Goran Gunchev|Pasha|Mark Coolidge Johnson|Les Weldon|Ivaylo Spasimirov|Dimiter Doichinov|Valentin Ganev|Niki Iliev|Andrey Kovalev|Kathryn Le|Roselbell Rafferr|Roselbell|Irson Kudikova
title: Ataque terrorista
